name: Valour
description:
Game Overview

Story

Barons claim the lands and businesses of those who work hard, occupying resources and preying on the weak and poor. You and a friend must team team up, become heroes and stand up to this evil. Explore various locations, each with their own unique design and challenges to overcome.

What a dangerous time to be alive…. Will you triumph? Will your name make it to the hall of heroes? Or will you merely be forgotten…
